text: On the count of 3, everyone point at the player who flirts the most. The most pointed at player takes 2 sips

Everyone vote for the most sober player, it's time for them to down their drink!

[Name] has to close their eyes while the other players hide their drink. If they can't find it in the next 30 second, they have to down it all
